text: Booba is an animated TV show for children featuring the character with the same name discovering things around the world. It is produced by 3D Sparrow. ==Plot== A family show following the adventures of a joyful, funny and curious little creature called Gavnil and his friends. They always find themselves in hilarious situations trying to explore the world around them. Gavnil is a main character from the Booba franchise. The show follows Booba and his friends, Loola, Spike, and Mr Beak. The cartoon has no words or speech and was intended for children one to three years of age. Each episode is a few minutes long.
title: Booba (TV series)
